name: Little Treasures (Michael Wolf, joshuachan93)
description:
Play as a crow with a broken wing and help an old lady find her lost treasures. 

Hop, flap, and glide your way through the world in search of precious lost momentos.


Developers:

  • Michael Wolf (@MichaelWolf95) - Game Design/Production/Engineering
  • Joel Lee (Linkedin) - Engineering/Design
  • Zaire Wilson (Linkedin) - Programming
  • Eric Franco (@franc0o__) - Design/Programming/Writing
  • Joshua W. Baltazar (@Monstro_damus) - Writing/Production
  • Kei Matsuo (@nightsharkss) - Audio/Design
  • Seth Leue - Audio/Design
  • Yann Joslin (Linkedin) - Programming/Audio
  • Sarah Cho (@picklechippy) - Art
  • Ashley Alicea (@avashly) Technical Art/In-editor Development

Asset Credits:

  • Easy Collider Editor by Pmurph03
  • Fast Volumetric Blob Shadows by Pixel Tea
  • Obi Rope by Virtual Method
  • Non Convex Mesh Collider by productivity-boost.com
  • POLYGON - Town Pack by Synty Studios
  • LOW POLY - Jewelcrafting Pack by TitanForge
  • Final IK by Root Motion
  • Toon Water Shader
